name: Intro
commands: Through this town is the estate of the Duke.|The waterways are rather nice...
Almost makes me want a dip...|But now's hardly the time, of course.
Quite, but it's eerily quiet for this time of day...
This town is rather nice...|Hang on, am I imagining... a floating eye...?
Is someone playing tricks on us...?|Gah! Another goopy! thing!
Looks like there's one man amongst them...
Feeble travellers! Feel the might of Arcei's mightiest magic!
It all feels so strange...|You think if Arcei were involved they'd be more... discreet.
Well... yeah...|Who'd want that kind of attention?
Quake in fear as my monsters sever your limbs!|Hahaha!
Screaming like a lunatic is not discreet at all.|Let us put an end to this freak before he does anything...
source:
chapter_title
change_background;Village 6 Day
music;The Waxwork Museum
multi_add_portrait;Leap;Left;Prof;Right
transition;open
speak;Leap;Whew, we're on Ilkrest territory.
speak;Prof;Through this town is the estate of the Duke.|The waterways are rather nice...
speak;Leap;Almost makes me want a dip...|But now's hardly the time, of course.
speak;Prof;Quite, but it's eerily quiet for this time of day...
speak;Leap;Yeah, you're right...|Let's go onward!
multi_remove_portrait;Leap;Prof
change_background
move_cursor;7,13
spawn_group;Player;south;Player;normal;stack
multi_add_portrait;Leap;MidRight;Prof;FarRight
speak;Prof;This town is rather nice...|Hang on, am I imagining... a floating eye...?
speak;Leap;Is someone playing tricks on us...?|Gah! Another goopy! thing!
speak;Leap;This is awful...
speak;Prof;Looks like there's one man amongst them...
move_cursor;Zashar
flicker_cursor;Zashar
music;62 Prelude to Dispute
add_portrait;Zashar;Left
speak;Zashar;Feeble travellers! Feel the might of Arcei's mightiest magic!
speak;Leap;Arcei...
speak;Prof;It all feels so strange...|You think if Arcei were involved they'd be more... discreet.
speak;Leap;Well... yeah...|Who'd want that kind of attention?
speak;Zashar;Quake in fear as my monsters sever your limbs!|Hahaha!
speak;Prof;Screaming like a lunatic is not discreet at all.|Let us put an end to this freak before he does anything...
speak;Leap;Yes... Let's do it!
music_clear
music;ResolveDark
prep
